channel.title: BemaScape with player owned houses, marrage. (GE coming soon)
channel.description:
Bemascape is 3% done, but still awesome!
BBH is a website where a group of ppl hack games and create games. We like to create games, so..... thats what were doing now!
Bemascape will be released shortly with player-owned houses and grand exchange. Thanks for listening :)
[img]http://tigerden.uppit.com/save/fb90c4b45fb72aaffacacd87bd840aa2/4ac15732/0209/lbcsncf8/5.jpg[/img]
